name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Inception Part 2
description: The INCEPTION series is going back to the roots of the Hacker Evolution games. The levels from the original Hacker Evolution game have been remastered for the new Hacker Evolution Duality engine. Experience an entirely different game through this DLC as you hack your way through the levels from the original Hacker Evolution game,...

name: ToA: Seasons Of The Wolf - Bad Blood
description: In "Bad Blood," DLC for the base game ToA: Seasons of the Wolf, you'll find out what really happened to our heroes after they returned to Ninim.

name: Unity of Command: Black Turn
description: This prequel DLC, whose events happen prior to "Stalingrad Campaign", completes the Eastern Front story as told by "Unity of Command". Take control of the Wehrmacht and its allies in Operation Barbarossa, from the dramatic early victories all the way to ignominious defeat at the gates of Moscow.

name: Retro Vaders: Reloaded - Classified Projects
description: A collection of brand new content developed especially for Retro Vaders: Reloaded that expands the game even further!

name: Phoenix Point: Corrupted Horizons
description: A new deadly strain of the Pandoravirus appears that saps the will from every being it touches! This is a deadly threat to Phoenix, but can they make use of it against the Pandorans, as well? New enemies, a new soldier type, and new campaign missions.

name: Border Force: Space Force
description: Border Force goes to space! Featuring a new 8 day campaign and new multiplayer map: all with no gravity!

name: Oik 5: DLC
description: New levels and soundtrack file.

name: House Designer
description: House Designer is a home design and construction simulator that lets you learn all the stages of construction without leaving your home. Design, build, finish, experiment, combining unusual architectural elements and enjoy your dream house.

name: Entity
description: Secure the site against hostile Entities or take control of an Alpha Entity and fight against your human oppressors! Entity pits humanity against supernatural "Entities" in an asymmetric multiplayer first person shooter.

name: Sokoban (Boxman) Classic
description: Classic box pushing Sokoban puzzle game, with 306 mentally stimulating levels.

name: Sea Dogs: To Each His Own - Hero of the Nation
description: Fight your way to the very top of French powers! Sieges, epic sea battles and dirty colonial business affairs! Whould you like to become a General-Governor of French New World?

name: Field of Glory II: Medieval - Swords and Scimitars
description: Field of Glory II: Medieval - Swords and Scimitars is a turn-based tactical game set in the High Middle Ages and it's the second DLC for Field of Glory II: Medieval. Developed by the legendary Richard Bodley Scott it brings the best from the tabletop world into the best digital framework.

name: Kurt: Der Fussballmanager
description: Kurt: Der Fussballmanager - The perfect soccer manager for young and old. Game depth and fun guaranteed. KURT puts football back in the spotlight.

name: Descending: House of Nightmares
description: Descending is a VR horror game with puzzle elements. You play as the new owner of a house and your goal is to break the curse that was cast upon the estate.

name: The Detail: Episode 3 - Devil in the Detail
description: Devil in the Detail is the third and final episode of the first season of The Detail, a neo-noir crime adventure from Rival Games. It brings the modern noir story of detective Reggie Moore, informant Joe Miller and officer Katelyn Hayes to a dramatic finale.

name: The Seven Years War (1756-1763): Pomeranian War
description: The Seven Years War (1756-1763) - Pomeranian WarONCE A GREAT NORTHERN EMPIRE, NOW DEGRADED. A FLEETING MOMENT IN HISTORY. A CHANCE TO RESTORE WHAT WAS LOST?- new playable nation: Sweden- 5 new campaign scenarios for Sweden, where you may attempt to lead the nation from 1750 all the way through the war, or go for historical goals in the...

name: Iterria Zone
description: Iterria Zone - Horde destroying game. First-person Shooter, Survival, Horror

name: The Game of Life 2: Fairytale Kingdom World
description: There are more worlds to explore in THE GAME OF LIFE 2. Join your friends and family in a mystical adventure through the Fairytale Kingdom world, where dreams come true!

name: Rainbows, Toilets & Unicorns: Entertainment Corp.
description: Defeat the evil corporation in the Entertainment Corp. DLC

name: Farm Manager 2021: Brewing & Winemaking
description: Start producing beer and wine in Farm Manager 2021 Brewing and Winemaking package. Get the fields ready for hops and grapevines, harvest the crops and prepare a perfect recipe to produce your own type of the most appreciated spirit in the world.

name: CyberPunk Sex Tower
description: The world of the future, modern technologies make it possible to create a super realistic sexual experience ...

name: Aphelion
description: Jump into a commander chair and strap in. Explore a vast and changing universe as a Federation combat pilot. Fight your enemies and expand the influence of the Federation across different regions and constellations. Gather resources and research technologies to aid you on a conquest of the frontier.

name: Hymeno Striker: Akashicverse Minigame
description: This is a horizontal scrolling shmups featuring Hymeno, the boss character of "Akashicverse: Malicious Wake". There are three stages with three difficulty levels. At first glance, the game looks poppy and easy to play, but it's really "Akashicverse" inside.

name: Jewels of the Mysterious Woodland: Fairies Magical Jewel Match Quest
description: Fairies Magical Jewel Match Quest - The new match 3 game is here, with brilliant jewels in over 600 dazzling puzzles! A magical journey filled with waves of excitement and brilliant visuals! Swap jewels to clear the way, and match pieces to crush each challenge that lies ahead.

name: Fallen
description: Finish what had already begun, halt the Darkness in its tracks, and shape a brighter future for the entire world. Prove yourself worthy as a warrior, as you take on what no faint heart could fathom.

name: Defender of the Turrets: Warp Attack
description: Defender of the Turrets : Warp Attack is an Arcade Shooter where you can buy different Towers and upgrade them to destroy Waves of incoming Enemies.

name: The Game of Life 2: Sandy Shores World
description: Dive into The Game of Life 2: Sandy Shores world! Watch the difficult decisions melt away on this forever holiday in the land of sunshine! Ride the waves as a Surf Instructor, or swim beneath them as a Marine Biologist. It's a life-long escape and the choices are all yours!

name: The Game of Life 2: Age of Giants World
description: Step into The Game of Life 2: Age of Giants world! Experience a land where pegs and dinosaurs are the best of friends! From Coastal Caves, through the Jurassic Jungle, all the way to Stone Town, it's the journey of your prehistoric life!

name: Space Fox Kimi and the Interstellar Fortress
description: Kimi and her crewmates on board the GFE Agedashi comes across a strange installation built on top of a large asteroid... What could be waiting for them inside the Interstellar Fortress?

name: The Lost Artifacts
description: Explore dungeons, find crafting materials, unlock new locations and battle monsters in this turn based rpg game!

name: Scary Tales
description: Scary Tales is a tactical first-person action arena set in a mystical setting of Slavic folk tales. The story tells about a young priest from a special squad who fights against various evil spirits that exist in our world.

name: Door 2: Key - Path to Heaven
description: Return to an unforgettable adventure with the DLC Door2: Key - Path to heaven. You have to visit 2 new worlds in the simulation and solve a bunch of new puzzles.

name: Groove Catcher
description: Groove Catcher is a rhythm-and-dance game that grooves and flows. We've got smooth moves, tight rhythms and beauty. Feeling chill? Feeling energized? We've got all moods covered, or load your own songs. Build your own levels right in the game just by dancing and share them with the world!

name: Army Gals: The Poker Game
description: Can you beat the three girls at five card strip poker and reveal the gals a little more intimately.

name: Miscreated: Canyonlands
description: Miscreated: Canyonlands DLC is a completely brand-new map for Miscreated, developed from the ground up to utilize a vastly new environment based in a fictional Navajo desert. Survive and explore in a post-apocalyptic open world with up to 50 players on a server.

name: Sex Office Story
description: Sex Office story presents the idea of a perfect job. You alone at work full of hot horny women.

name: Descent: Road to Legend - Trials of Frostgate
description: The Trials of Frostgate are not for the faint of heart. Only the bravest shall be named Champion.Trials of Frostgate transports 2-4 heroes to the Free City of Frostgate, where the Northern Tribes have gathered for feasting, dancing, and sacred rituals, including the famed trials.

name: Dissection Simulator: Dogfish Edition
description: VictoryXR’s virtual shark dissection software is a hands-on opportunity experienced through the power of VR. Join Wendy Martin, national award-winning science teacher, to guide you through a virtual reality shark dissection.

name: Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord - The Age of Turbulence
description: In the last years of the Han Dynasty, the empire was plunged into long-term chaos and turmoil. The warlords fought with each other; bandits run rampant; foreign races disturbed the frontiers; ancient beasts seem to be coming to the world soon...

name: Amazed
description: Amazed is an atmospheric first-person exploration adventure game with elements of action and horror. Lost in a labyrinth, prey to others. Find as many items and clues to escape it and enjoy escalating difficulty in both exploration and action aspects of the game.

name: Expiration
description: In the valley near Kohen City, there’s a small town called Tucker Vale. After receiving strange signals from the mountains, all communications with Tucker Vale vanish. A team of Special Forces has been sent on a mission to check on the village and find out what happened.

name: Rainbows, Toilets & Unicorns: Outraged & offended
description: Fight for your right in the Outraged & offended DLC

name: Refuge For Troubles: Episode 1 - Dear Stranger
description: No more word: just the story of how the lobotomy was defeated by the forces of strong male friendship.

name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Hacker Bootcamp
description: Welcome to the Hacker Bootcamp. This learning mission will be an opportunity for you to prove yourself as a competent tech hacker and learn the features and gameplay of Hacker Evolution Duality. You will find various files in this level that give excerpts from the Hacker Evolution Duality game manual.

name: Space Fox Kimi: The Battle of Mochi Prime
description: A stroke of luck, a once in a lifetime chance to end the war. The fleet gathers in preparation for an invasion. The Battle of Mochi Prime... is about to begin.

name: Heroes of Legionwood: Episode 3
description: Heroes of Legionwood: End of Days is the riveting final chapter of the Heroes of Legionwood saga.

name: Heroes of Legionwood: Episode 2
description: Saved from the brink of oblivion, you must search for answers amongst a civil war that is tearing Port Alexis apart. It is up to you to pick a side and determine the ultimate fate of Port Alexis and discover the origins of the Darkness.

name: Mannequin House
description:
You wake up in your room and then go downstair, oddly almost all the doors are locked. You decide to go back to your room but suddenly your room turns into a hallway with a floor lamp and a door inside it.

You open the door and realize you are stuck in a loop, but you are not stuck alone. Will you escape ?

name: Swordsman 3: Xie Yun Liu Chuan
description: Swordman 3: Xie Yun Liu Chuan, will be based on the JX Online game universe and has no release date set yet.

name: BitCraft
description: BitCraft is an upcoming Survival Crafting MMORPG which takes place in a procedurally generated sandbox world with a deep skills system and a focus on crafting, economics, cultivating, and city building. There is a single, massive, editable world for all players to interact with and to permanently change. Players can choose to work together to tame the wilderness and create impressive towns and cities. They can even build empires across continents and oceans. At these levels, BitCraft becomes a deeply social and strategic game.

name: Odysseus Kosmos and his Robot Quest: Episode 4
description: What do you do if you are the only one left aboard a spaceship? Your team has embarked on a mysterious expedition a few years ago, the ship’s machinery has started acting up and it seems there are ghosts wandering about. Luckily, the black hole above you doesn’t pose any problems…yet.

name: Circle Empires Rivals: Forces of Nature
description: Nature has had enough and joins the battle in Circle Empires Rivals: Forces of Nature, a DLC for the fast-paced multiplayer RTS game Circle Empires Rivals! Command new leaders and units, explore the lore book and transform circle biomes in the brand new game mode: 'Terraform'!

name: Gas Guzzlers Extreme: Full Metal Zombie
description: A Zombie apocalypse has taken over the hi-octane GAS GUZZLERS EXTREME universe ! Normally this would be bad news for humanity, but not for you ! Armed to the teeth in your rig, and with insane power-ups littering each arena, you should be more than capable of obliterating the hordes of the undead.

name: Frontrunners
description: Frontrunners is a blend of tactical shooter and survival horror. Work alone or with your friends to move tactically through a range of levels to complete paid contracts. Money means more guns and equipment. Fight against a horrific range of enemy entities that will hunt you relentlessly.

name: Love: Interactive Therapy
description: Love: Interactive Therapy is a relationship application for married couples looking to stimulate love, affection, romance and intimacy in their relationship. Build a stronger more intimate bond with your partner and improve your relationship and love life.

name: The Game of Life 2: Frozen Lands World
description: Explore in The Game of Life 2. Put on your warmest coat and snow boots, it's time to join your friends and family for magic that will never melt away, in the Frozen Lands world!

name: Odysseus Kosmos and his Robot Quest: Episode 5
description: What do you do if you are the only one left aboard a spaceship? Your team has embarked on a mysterious expedition a few years ago, the ship’s machinery has started acting up and it seems there are ghosts wandering about. Luckily, the black hole above you doesn’t pose any problems…yet.

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation - Lily-ad Dungeon
description: The Lily-ad Dungeon DLC allow players to explore Lily Rank specific dungeons and raise their Lily Ranks at a faster rate!

name: Streamline
description: Streamline is a very early build of the FPS being developed by Watson Digital. Featuring many game modes such as Capture the Flag, and Team Deathmatch.

name: RoguekiniZ
description: A rogue-like looter-shooter, with bikinis and zombies, and zombies in bikinis. Level up, loot up, look good, kill good.

name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Inception Part 3
description: Extend your gaming experience with 10 new levels contained in this new DLC. The INCEPTION series is going back to the roots of the Hacker Evolution games. The levels from the original Hacker Evolution Untold game have been remastered for the new Hacker Evolution Duality engine.

name: House of Velez: Part 2
description: The continuation- and the end to House of Velez. Re-enter the house and uncover the full story behind this bloody nightmare. A whole new cast of otherworldly monstrosities, and sadistic puzzles, await to pull the flesh from your bones. Travel carefully and you may yet survive this unholy trial.

name: Gas Guzzlers Extreme: Full Metal Frenzy
description: In Full Metal Frenzy the racing mayhem that is Gas Guzzlers Extreme continues with new maps, new cars and new power-ups not to be missed!

name: Age of Barbarian Extended Cut: The Slaves' Fortress
description: The slaves' fortress stands on a rugged spur of rock, apparently unattainable. Here lives a notorious slave's master named Gurgo, who decides on the fate of men brought here from all over to be bought or sold.

name: Hungry Dino
description: Have you ever realized that you are ready to eat a horse? Help the little dinosaur to eat with various tasty treats, and do not become a delicacy yourself.

name: Peg Solitaire
description: A relaxing, yet challenging peg jumping board game.

name: Germany at War: Soviet Dawn
description: Germany At War: Soviet Dawn is a turn-based operational wargame, with a strong historical focus. You command either the German forces through a branching historical campaign covering the entire 1941 campaign as well as part of the 1942 one or the Soviets from 1941 to the revenge of 1944/45.

name: Block Smash
description: Choose your powerup, ball, and paddle and face off against a variety of blocks in this game inspired by Breakout!

name: Electronic Super Joy 2: Groove Wizard's Tower
description: Has the Groove Wizard returned? MAYBE HE'S AFTER YOUR BUTT!??? DLC includes: A new world to conquer! 15 amazing new levels! New music! 3 new achievements! Ride the sky whale! Less sexy butts. MORE SEXY BUTTS. ELECTRONIC RAINBOW GLAMOUR BOSS FIGHT!

name: Race for the Galaxy: Brink of War
description: As conflicts spread, galactic prestige becomes all-important, both to extract concessions and to fend off attackers. Meanwhile, the Alien departure point is located and the Uplift Overseers arise. Can you build the most prosperous and powerful space empire in a galaxy on the brink of total war?

name: Dots!
description: Dots! An exciting game built on an easy and relaxed gaming experience. You just need to relax and enjoy the gameplay for many hours.

name: Carrier Battles WW2: Admiral of the Fleet
description: A real-time WW2 naval warfare simulation game on tactical level, Admiral of Fleet features 20 scenarios covering the naval battles between carriers in the early stage of the war, from December 1941 to the end of 1942.

name: Retro
description: Retro is an arcade-style mini game collection with an arcade, story mode and a "corrupted" arcade! Play though the mini games in arcade mode, battle the virus in story mode or try for a new high score with much more challenging games in the corrupted arcade!

name: Secret Mission: Produce For President
description: Race for President is comming ! As an ordinary factory owner, what secret challenges are waiting for you?

name: The Pioneers: Surviving Desolation
description: The Pioneers: surviving desolation is a survival/simulation game for PC. You play as a crew of specialists isolated in a space station and trying to survive the climatic and geological threats of Io, the first moon of Jupiter. Customize your space station, manage your vital resources, explore the surrounding area to strategize and complete your mission.

name: Minigun vs. Swarms of the Zombie Apocalypse Simulator
description: 10k+ zombies on the same screen, faced with the scene of the doomsday, the raging tide of corpses, your Minigun is thirsty, yes! Hold on for 5 minutes if you think you are tough!

name: Bomber
description: Bomber - a funny time killer game with 20 levels

name: Potion Explosion: The Fifth Ingredient
description: It’s never too late to add to your magical education: The Fifth Ingredient expansion for Potion Explosion gives you a chance to go back to class and start learning some new tricks!

name: Devil Slayer
description: R18 Fantasy RPG

name: Knights of Pen and Paper: Haunted Fall
description: Knights of Pen & Paper: Haunted Fall expands on the unmistakable charm and wit of the original game with more enemies, more epic quest and more locations in a spine tingling Halloween setting.Navigate an engrossing new quest line where you square off against unruly Jack o Lanterns, wobbly undead and a mish mash of bewildered monsters.

name: Cavern Commandos
description: Inspired by classic platformers like Rick Dangerous, Cavern Commandos offers a challenging gaming experience with numerous weapons, hundreds of foes, and dozens of labyrinthine caverns.

name: DGU: Death God University - Midterm Mania
description: Introducing a brand new level with top secret military missions, the Army Barracks. You have two targets to deal with while every mistake of yours could prove to be your undoing.

name: Mini War: Three Kingdoms
description: Mini War: Three Kingdoms is a minimalist tactical game set in ancient China. You will challenge more than 160 levels with at least 16 different kinds of heroes, to fight various tactical formations alone. One person, defeat the entire ancient army.

name: The Detail: Episode 2 - From the Ashes
description: From the Ashes is the second episode of The Detail, a neo-noir crime adventure from Rival Games. It continues the story of detective Reggie Moore, informant Joe Miller and officer Katelyn Hayes as they seek to find out what is truly happening to their city.

name: Infinium Strike: Broken Overlord
description: New ships with special abilities await your command in a new mini-campaign. Get back into the Wrog war to save humankind and also free the space creatures known as the Bubba. Extend the challenging journey of the Freedom Strike carrier with the Broken Overlord!

name: Memory Lane
description: A game that you'll never forget! Memory Lane is a turned based RPG about taking names. Literally.

name: Tiny T
description: Unleash a furry of magic, bullets, blades , explosives and natural disasters on Tiny T!

name: Medieval Archery Simulator
description: Prove your skills in Medieval Archery Simulator! Sign up for different tournaments, showcase your marksmanship, and challenge the greatest archers the world has ever seen! Train, modify your arrows, upgrade your bow, and compete in a variety of exciting and unusual challenges.

name: Food War TD
description: A Tower Defense-Storytelling game about fighting against healthy foods!

name: qop: DLC
description: In this DLC you get 12 new levels for qop.

name: Age of Fear: The Undead King Gold - The Quest for Immortality
description: Talnes, an aspiring alchemist, always wanted to be a hero. With an ancient tome stolen from his master, he embarks on a journey to find the secret of eternal youth. What kind of challenges await our heroes? Will Talnes reach his goal or be consumed by ancient beasts?

name: Organ Trail: Final Cut Expansion
description: The Final Cut Expansion adds double the content to Organ Trail.New features include:Choose-your-route on the road with twice as many cities5 unlockable cars 10 unlockable characters3 new boss fights3 new zombie typesRadiation mechanic gives you a new way to die Hit and Run driving jobGraveyard retrieval mission FishingMore and new bandit...

name: Max Raider
description: Max Raider is a top-down 3D action shooter where you fight waves of enemies on procedurally generated arenas. Rest and prepare for the next series of waves by buying a variety of weapons and items from your allies. Protect the Bunker, your only hope for a home.

name: Knight of Exile
description: Prepare your weapons and head to battle, Knight of Exile is a 2D action platformer with hack-n-slash combat where you will embark on a journey of revenge and redemption to liberate the kingdom of Olmur.

name: Couch Combat
description: Couch Combat is a fun, frantic, Splitscreen FPS made specifically with PC players in mind! Play with up to 4 players locally in short, fast-paced rounds.

name: Flingleberries!
description: FLING, PULL, KICK! Do whatever it takes to win! Play across 5 UNIQUE MAPS and 3 GAME MODES! Collect a variety of pickups from SWORDS to RAYGUNS! Online Multiplayer via REMOTE PLAY TOGETHER![/list]

name: Apocrypha
description: Apocrypha is a multiplayer magical action game where you participate in tactical team-based fights. Build your unique mage, develop your own playstyle using wide variety of spells and abilities, craft useful items and gain rewards!

name: Deception
description: Deception is a 3D puzzle adventure set in an underground mysterious place. No one knows how to enter, no one knows how to escape.

name: Gods of Havoc: Into the Void - Rise of the AI
description: Re-enter a universe where other gods are the least of your worries. A deadly robot army now seeks to obliterate all life, and all religion!

name: Redux
description: A puzzle game about destroying your past self.

name: Rainbows, Toilets & Unicorns: Influencerama
description: Defeat the most ruthless influencers in the Influencerama DLC

name: Hard Reset: Extended Edition - Exile
description: In the only remaining human city of Bezoar, Major Fletcher, an Army Combat Veteran and soldier of the CLN, is dragged into a conflict between two of mankind's greatest enemies. He is to discover that nothing is what it seems to be.Hard Reset is an action-packed, single-player shooter for the PC.

name: Elmo's Kangaroo of the damned: Punishment Edition
description: Your name is Elmo. You have a kangaroo. Your kangaroo is missing. GET... IT... BACK!

name: Girl.exe
description: You and your friends go to another world because you wanted to find a girlfriend. And you found one.... There is one crazy girl in this world. Will you be able to get out of this world or will you stay with her forever?

name: Conjuntalia: Overcome the Death of a Loved One
description: You are in the highest part of an unknown tower, beyond the sky, accompanied by Michi... What could happen?...

name: Indian Army: Mission Pok
description: This is Third person shooter Game based on indian army .

name: The Game of Life 2: Haunted Hills world
description: Explore new worlds in THE GAME OF LIFE 2. Enter a realm where creepy creatures rule! Join your friends and family for a spooky adventure, wherever you are!

name: Battlestage
description: - Co-op Twin Stick Shooter

name: Walkerman: Act 2 - Herdchaser-girl
description: The second installment of Walkerman, a Visual Novel by ScalemaiL.

name: Crude
description: Kosmos is an MMA fighter who suddenly finds himself teleported into a dark fantasy world and searches for a way to return home. CRUDE is a Soul-like, fantasy platformer with metroidvania elements & an open world map.

name: The Remainder: Act 2
description: The Remainder is a dark fantasy mystery where you will try to save The High Magus Vyn from certain death. Will you find your way alone or will you reignite a lost love? Is it worth the sacrifice? Do you deserve to be saved?

name: Alice VR: Roboto Factory
description: Get inside the famous Roboto Factory, where all the bots you've met on Speculo were created. Discover its workings and see your old mechanical companions in a new light.

name: Neighbor: Lingering Memories Side-Story
description: Andou, a writer for occult-focused magazine publisher Misty Publishing, ends up spending the night at a shady property on order from his boss, Uchiyama. Maebara Heights, room 103. Investigating the rumors of disappearances linked to the room, Andou finds himself swalled into a dark mystery.

name: Glory
description: Glory is an RTS/Simulation game set in the Medieval period. Command your army in combat and battles to defeat your enemy and achieve victory. For Glory!

name: eSports Manager
description: eSports Manager is an eSports organization manager simulator. Sign players and staff, manage squad, training and tactics to achieve the title of the best team in the world!

name: Ignis Universia: Awakening of the Erudite Empress
description: Ignis Universia is a cute and funny JRPG and Visual Novel mix with a seasoning of tongue-in-cheek story that references to old genre classics. May contain references to stereotypes and clichés (RPG, fantasy, music, anime and small doses of other nerdy interests).

name: Archangel: Hellfire - Fully Loaded
description: Fight for reign over post-apocalyptic lands: Go solo and explore life before all-out war ignited, or battle waves of enemy mechs in Mech Assault Coop Mode (1-4p)—Enlist in The Great Mech Wars today!

name: The Cure
description: An open world strategy game set in a dark medieval fantasy environment. You can buy and place buildings and you must manage your resources to upgrade them. Every night, you are attacked by creatures.

name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Inception Part 1
description: INCEPTION Part 1 is going back to the roots of the Hacker Evolution games. We have taken the levels from the original Hacker Evolution game and remastered them for the new Hacker Evolution Duality engine. Experience an entirely new game through this DLC as you hack your way through 10 levels.

name: Super Lucky's Tale: Gilly Island
description: Welcome back to adventure! "Super Lucky's Tale", returns with an all new chapter. Join Lucky as he journeys to the tropical resort of "Gilly Island" where Lady Meowmalade has hijacked the festivities and is throwing the greatest (worst) party ever.

name: Selenon Rising: Episode 3
description: Episode 3 continues the story of Selenon Rising.

name: Selenon Rising: Episode 2
description: Episode 2 continues the story of Selenon Rising.

name: Shadowrun Chronicles: Infected - Missions
description: Random Mission Pack: Boston never sleeps and there are always Nuyen and Karma to be earned for an industrious Shadowrunner. From collecting nanite samples to freeing hostages and defusing bombs, a wealth of repeatable randomized set-ups mission will keep you on your toes and allow you to improve your character and gear.

name: Fire Trump: Air Combat VR
description: President Thump of Country A always provokes disputes between countries in the world, making people of all countries uneasy. In order to defend the peace of the world, let us fly fighter jets to war against this selfish politician!

name: fullybroKen
description: Play as single character in a 4x game. Survive. Thrive. Die. Unite the country of Mir. Kill, make hard choice, become anything you want in this unique post-apocalyptic game. Die. With ideas from 4X, Match-3 RPGs, Traditional RPGs and roguelikes, fullybroKEN offers an experience unlike anything else.

name: Einar: Loki's Traps
description: Einar is a Viking who, finding himself a god, had a surprise.

name: Monitor: The Game - Alix: A Monitor Story
description: Alix: A MONITOR Story is a narrative-based point and click game that revolves around the player character of Nathan Ryker; a budding private investigator and detective who is trying to make an honest living but has had to set up in the inner-city areas of New York. 120 choices to make and 7 endings...

name: Shadowrun Chronicles: Boston Lockdown - Infected!
description: With Boston saved, but still under Lockdown, what do you do if you have become one of the infected yourself? As you loose control over your body and mind, you will have to find a cure or die trying!

name: Shan Gui II: Sweet Osmanthus II - Episode 2
description: He Jia and Han Hui, Li Qiucheng and He Dai, He Ren and Eryue Lan... Different people encountered with their thoughts conveyed. In this autumn day, shall they lost again in sweet osmanthus's fragrance?

name: Victor Vran: Cauldron of Chaos Dungeon
description: The Cauldron of Chaos is an ever-changing dungeon that offers randomized daily challenges for veteran demon hunters. This new content is available only for characters of level 26 and above.

name: Escape the Ayuwoki: The Summoning
description: Re-experience the tragic, final moments that occurred in the burning mansion as you try to escape far away from it. You play as Alexa, another survivor from the mansion who is trying to get away from the horrors of this haunting place.

name: The Line: The Other Path
description: The other path is an alternative way to stand in the Line. In this DLC you can ignore cops, knocking at your door and escape in old living district.

name: Earth Attack
description: Tragedy strikes as aliens attack Earth. You're left alone to pilot the last remaining spacecraft on its way back to Earth from Mars Colony. Avoid missiles, asteroids, enemy ships, and more as you accumulate high-scores in Earth Attack!

name: Unity of Command: Red Turn
description: Dying days of the Stalingrad Campaign saw the Wehrmacht reeling under heavy blows.

name: Odysseus Kosmos and his Robot Quest: Episode 2
description: What do you do if you are the only one left aboard a spaceship? Your team has embarked on a mysterious expedition a few years ago, the ship’s machinery has started acting up and it seems there are ghosts wandering about. Luckily, the black hole above you doesn’t pose any problems…yet.

name: DGU: Death God University - Sinister Semester
description: Introducing a spooky new level ‘Asylum & Rehab’ with two new interesting targets to plot and set a trap for. Put your insanity on display in this macabre setting!

name: Thea: The Awakening - Return of the Giants
description: The Return of the Giants is a free DLC for Thea: The Awakening. Just as you thought the Darkness was dealt with, a new threat rises and shakes the ground you've built on! Discover 70 new quests, new creatures and buildings and create your very own adventures in Thea!

name: Smugglers V: The Smugglers Guild
description: With this downloadable content (DLC) you will receive three background stories (mini-quests) called "The Smugglers Guild", "Solomon´s Treasure" and "Thirst for Vengeance" for the game "Smugglers 5: Secession".

name: Blue Snake Adventures: Master Level
description: Blue Snake Adventures: Master level is a dlc for blue snake adventures base game.

name: VoidExpanse: Pariahs' Bane
description: In this expansion you will face a new threat to the sector - a group of renegades know as Pariahs, led by the infamous Shank Twice. Pariahs are in the habit of asking favors no one can't refuse, and you might become one of those unfortunates. Dive into a brand-new storyline involving pirates, sabotage and gang wars.

name: Curiosity
description: "Curiosity killed the cat, but after satisfying it she was resurrected." This game is a visual novel. Features of the game - puzzles and several endings, depending on your choice.

name: Terminus
description: Embark on a psychedelic 30 minute VR journey into a mysterious universe of alien architecture, populated by humanoid clones and cryptic symbols.

name: The Escapists: Santa's Sweatshop
description: After suffering Santa's cruel regime for 20 years, it's time you got back home to enjoy Christmas with your real family. Sick and tired of bad working conditions and rubbish pay, you decide to hit Santa where it hurts most and escape Santa's Sweatshop!

name: Odysseus Kosmos and his Robot Quest: Episode 3
description: What do you do if you are the only one left aboard a spaceship? Your team has embarked on a mysterious expedition a few years ago, the ship’s machinery has started acting up and it seems there are ghosts wandering about. Luckily, the black hole above you doesn’t pose any problems…yet.

name: Two Worlds II: Shattered Embrace
description: Return to Antaloor for a brand new adventure in the Two Worlds saga! When the ancient Elves resurface on a remote island, an old secret leads to the rise of a new evil. Racing against time, you must travel to the depths of hell and back before secrets of the past destroy the future of the land!

name: Z: Escape - Aftermath
description: Test or prepare yourself against the main villains.

name: Memories
description: Memories is a horror game where you explore a murder victims house and try to investigate the case while navigating around a house, avoiding the evil spirits that lurk within. Surviving the investigation will be a true test of your fears, explore the house if you dare. Entering the house you're tasked with finding out what happened to Malina Edward and why and how she was murdered. Once you find yourself in the house, you can explore the entire house and gather clues on what possibly happened to Malina, the more you piece together about her death you discover more and more that this house isn't a normal house. You find that the house is haunted with different demons trying to murder you after Malina.

name: Vivid Surf
description: Vivid Surf is a new take on the glitch made mechanic called 'surf'. Glide frictionlessly through the surreal environments in a single-player focused campaign. Get rewarded as you improve your skill with a comprehensive timer. Then take the skills you learned to the multiplayer Remball arena.

name: Deltarune
description: UNDERTALE's parallel story, DELTARUNE. Meet new and old characters in a tale that steps closer to its end, chapter by chapter. Dodge bullets in nonviolent RPG battles as you listen to funky, funky music.

name: Lawn Invaders
description:
The year is 2075, join everybody's favourite millennial gaming grandpa as he fends off creatures he hallucinates after doing nothing but play games his entire life.

LawnInvaders is an arcade shooter where the player must defend the lawn from a variety of falling enemies, these enemies slowly break apart the ground making it more difficult to defend.

name: Mage Chess
description: 3D Chess game with fully animated pieces.

name: Flappy Galaxy: Master Level
description: A New Challenge awaits you in a more difficult level.

name: Kyle is Famous: Kyle is Santa
description: In the cold, barren midwinter, a sole figure rises from his slumber. Kyle, readying his day, looks on that which he will encounter... Oh my goodness, why are there elves growing out of his skin? Who gave that child a claymore??? Why is Rachel turning into a puss lump of flesh???

name: FootRock 2: VR
description: Footrock - game for the whole family. You will become a legendary sportsman, who will go through the fascinating and unpredictable levels on football arenas.

name: Stayhomer
description: "Disinfect" all anti-lockdown protesters.

name: Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio - Zombies: Rivals
description: Rivals are back in force! Among the staple Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio - Zombies characters, Jennifer steps out in her new army outfit and Natasha takes on a casual uniform. Army-style Jennifer and casual-style Natasha, they both have high Attack levels but low Ammo Reserve levels, which is perfect for attackers.

name: Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio - Zombies: Dragon Set + Permanent Character
description: Three solid weapons that represent the core of classic CS combat, with the added presence and zeal of a Dragon.

name: Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio - Zombies: Oz's Trio
description:
One of the most well-known tales, The Wonderful Wizard of Oz, and its lessons can easily be converted to the land of zombies. A true hero should have a strong heart and courage to fight the endless enemies, use their brains so as to come up with tactics against the toughest of bosses and not get overpowered by zombies, and most importantly, a true hero must have a good team to challenge the impossible.

However, Zombies: Oz's Trio is no fairy tale and happy endings depend strictly on battlefield experience and firepower. We introduce a new set of unique DLC weapons that will help you come back home safely.

name: Idle Expanse: Chronoscope Technology
description: This DLC gives you a preview of whether or not a planet contains Time Crystals or contract givers.

name: Idle Expanse: Reality Shifter
description: This DLC unlocks alternate realities 101 through 1000.

name: Superdimension Neptune vs. Sega Hard Girls: Segami's Astral Brave
description: A new class for Segami.

name: Superdimension Neptune vs. Sega Hard Girls: Exp Expert
description: EXP Expert' will be able to drastically increase Exp obtained post-battle.

name: Superdimension Neptune vs. Sega Hard Girls: If's Gust of Wind
description: A new class for IF.

name: Superdimension Neptune vs. Sega Hard Girls: Fever Gauge Plus
description: Fever Gauge Plus will be able to cause the Fever Gauge to increase drastically.

name: Big Byz Wars
description: Run'n'Gun in dystopian sci-fi 2.5D side scroller. As a mercenary of the biggest flying city - Byzantium aka 'Big Byz', you will deal with some delicate issues and missions.

name: Soaring
description: Soaring is a challenging platformer where you must climb ever upwards to reach what you have lost, just mind your step !

name: Captain vs. Sky Pirates: Evil Village
description:
This pack contains:
- new world map Evil Village
- New levels
- New World
- Enemies
- 30 levels
- Epic bosses
- Upgrade weapons and explosives

name: Captain vs. Sky Pirates: Moon Base
description:
This pack contains:
- new world map Moon Base
- Protect the moon base from evil pirates
- New levels
- New World
- Enemies
- 30 levels
- Epic bosses
- Upgrade weapons and explosives

name: Captain vs. Sky Pirates: Forest
description:
This pack contains
- new world map Forest
- New levels
- New World
- Enemies
- 30 levels
- Epic bosses
- Upgrade weapons and explosives

name: Captain vs. Sky Pirates: Post Apocalyptic City
description:
This pack contains:
- new world map Post Apocalyptic City
- New levels
- New World
- Enemies
- 30 levels
- Epic bosses
- Upgrade weapons and explosives

name: NITE Team 4: Operation Withering Dusk
description: A major data breach has left Kotok Analytics security in question. They hire NT4 to find the data, destroy it, and attempt to bring the perpetrators to justice.

name: Empires Apart: French Civilization
description: The French Knights charge into battle! Play as the proud French – a Defensive civilization that focuses on formidable cavalry, great economy, technology and siege weapons.

name: Empires Apart: Mongol Civilization
description: The Golden Horde rides into battle! Play as the unstoppable Mongols – an aggressive nomadic civilization that focuses solely on cavalry.

name: Empires Apart: Arab Civilization
description: The blades of faithful shine on the battlefield! Play as the relentless Arabs - an advanced civilization that focuses on knowledge and conversion.

name: Empires Apart: Korean Civilization
description: The Noblemen of Korea lead the offensive! Play as the magnificent Koreans - an advanced civilization that focuses on gunpowder units and economy management.

name: Valor Legends: Eternity
description: Welcome to Valor Legends: Eternity! It's time to embark on your amazing adventure in the Oasis to fight the Shadow forces! Valor Legends: Eternity is a 3D idle game.

name: Barro: Track Pack 1
description: Additional tracks for the game.

name: Barro F: Cars Pack
description: Cars pack

name: Rogue's Tale: Bloodlines
description: Rogue's Tale - Bloodlines is the second expansion for Rogue's Tale. It allows the player to choose a bloodline during character creation after they have been unlocked during earlier runs.

name: Barro: Track Pack 2
description: Additional tracks for the game.

name: Pangea
description: Unique combination of turn-based strategy, tabletop game and roguelike. Make moves according to the roll of the dice on a randomly generated field and destroying enemies in tactical battles. Available 4 different factions.

name: Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms - Edo Treasure Box
description: Get more romance out of your favorite warrior bachelors in these six never-before-seen episodes!

name: Chat Millions: Stream Quiz Game
description: Play the classic 4-choice quiz with a new twist, and see if your twitch chat has what it takes to win the millions.

name: Through Hell to Heaven
description: Help Amy survive the Vile Demons in Hell in order to find the Portal and Ascend to Heaven.

name: Imperiums: Troy
description: Imperiums: Troy is a small-scale tactical scenario that sets the stage for participation in one of the most epic battles of ancient times. Join the greatest of Trojan and Greek heroes and prove your worth on the plains of Troy!

name: D&D Lords of Waterdeep: Undermountain
description: Undermountain, and expansion for Lords of Waterdeep, gives players new Dungeons & Dragons challenges in an exciting new setting beneath the city of Waterdeep. Test your skills with new Lord, Quest and Intrigue cards, against an expanded city with new buildings and agents.

name: Grey Zone: Altman
description: You are a mercenary of the elite unit of the largest syndicate "Alpha." You were sent to Pluton, where you will have to face difficulties. Spitfire character of the protagonist will lead him to the most dangerous places of this world. His fate is completely in your hands! [/ b]

name: Senko no Ronde 2: Rounder Karel
description: Use Karel and his rounder, Azureus in Arcade, Online and Offline Battle modes.

name: Heroines of Swords & Spells: Green Furies
description: An Anti-Heroic DLC for an epic and funny jRPG adventure with intricately detailed world and story. Revisit this world and look at the familiar story through the eyes of completely different protagonists.

name: Planet Bounce: Devastator DLC Pack
description: If you need more weapons and power the Devastator pack is what you are looking for. Gain 2 new ships and 3 upgrades in this DLC.

name: New Gundam Breaker: Special Mission - Her Name is Super Fumina
description: The day-one special mission "Her Name is Super Fumina" is the only mission where you'll find the titular Super Fumina! Complete it to receive a special Fumina Ticket that can be exchanged for any part you like!

name: Galaxy Reavers: Titan
description: A paid DLC for “Galaxy Reavers”, allowing commanders to unlock the giant warship “Titan” and build up a more diverse and powerful fleet to challenge higher level stages!

name: Tank Shoot 2D: Battle to save City Flag
description: Tank Shoot 2D can be played by 1 or 2 players.Protect your flag: Game over if enemies shoot flag.Kill all enemies to reach next stage. New stages bring new enemies, new types of walls and new challenges.This game promises countless hours of fun.

name: MBHL20
description: MBHL20 is a simulation hockey game that allows you to not only manage your team, but hone your skills as an individual player in the MiniBall Hockey League! You can pick your position to play with and against fully autonomous players in a 30 team league in your quest to win the cup!

name: Captain vs. Sky Pirates: Pyramids
description: Captain vs. Sky Pirates: Pyramids is a world map DLC for Captain vs. Sky Pirates. Apart from a new world, the game also features 30 new levels, enemies, epic bosses, and upgraded weapons and explosives.

name: Namsiku: Path of the Fang
description: Namsiku: Path of the Fang is a 2.5D story-driven adventure game with elements of puzzles, stealth, action, and combat. Join Namsiku, a shaman in search of his daughter, who has been captured by strange beings who want to seize the precious gold used as an offering to receive the blessing of the gods

name: Opa: Definitive Edition
description: Opa Definitive Edition is a 2D drawn obstacle-based game. You will guide a happy square through increasingly more difficult levels, enemies, and bosses with unique environment in their levels.

name: Trains Continental
description: Build your own transcontinental railroad in western America of XIX century. Collect and manage tracks, rebuild them to find the most optimal way for the train to cross even the most difficult terrains. Beware though! The clock is ticking and you need to finish the work before the time runs out!

name: Depth: Wilhelm Diver
description: Wilhelm Pack includes the Wilhelm diver skin along with the Mark V Dive Knife skin.

name: Barn Finders: Bid Wars
description: Take part in an endless number of auctions. Win access to more garages, abandoned containers, unclaimed luggage and sell found items for a lot of money. Become the king of bidding. Bid'em All!

name: Evolution Land
description: Evolution Land is a virtual simulation blockchain game that supports cross-chain interactions. The game will have up to 26 continents, each of which is deployed on a different public chain. The governance parameters, such as the trade tax rate, will be set by players.

name: Apocalypse Hotel: The Post-Apocalyptic Hotel Simulator! - The Thin Blue Line!
description: As if zombies, mutants, and aliens weren't trouble enough, everyday humans are now causing trouble on the streets. Help the re-established Swansea Police Force deal with this troublesome humans by repairing and renovating their police station, and by supplying them with a Policeman's Lounge at your hotel for them to relax after work.

name: Automobilista 2: Spa-Francorchamps
description: The epic Spa-Francorchamps arrives for Automobilista 2, initially featuring a laser-scanned version of the modern track as well as the historical variant from 1993.

name: Phantom Doctrine: Halloween Scare Tactics
description: Phantom Doctrine: Halloween Scare Tactics DLC provides players with new season content to help celebrate everyone's favorite spooky time of the year.

name: Punishment Darkness Online: Centre Ville
description: Discover the downtown area of Punishment Darkness Online.

name: Punishment Darkness Online: Grand Moun
description: Gives you access to the Grand Moun mission fragmented into four parts, and also gives you access to various improvements.

name: Rompe!
description: Rompe! is a platform game where everything you touch breaks! destroy and rebuild the world around you to escape the dungeon!

name: Hoard: Flame-Broiled Sandwich
description: Hoard: Flame-Broiled SANDwich takes the treasure gathering action to the mystical sands of the desert continent! Buildings, units, and terrain have been painstakingly remodeled to spotlight the colorful garb and inspired architecture of the desert kingdoms.

name: Hoard: Dynamite Roll!
description: Hoard: Dynamite Roll! DLC pack is full of new and exciting content including new maps, new units, new powerups, and more achievements!

name: Order of Battle: World War II - Allies Resurgent
description: The second of a trilogy of DLCs featuring World War II from the Allied perspective. The new campaign depicts battles in North Africa, the Mediterranean, and finally in Europe from late 1942 to early 1944.

name: Wildilfe Park 3: Dino Invasion
description: Living with dinosaurs is only fancifulness? No, it is real now. Blow the time dimension and beam the prehistoric jurassic giants with many other futuristic visitor attractions to your Wildlife Park. Dinosaurs, theme park attractions, a bunch of SF service facilities, extinct plants and new decorations.

name: Damned Hand: Arcade Mode
description: Improve your shoots by spawning as many bullets and zombies as you want.

name: Hunter X: Begin
description: Hunter X: Begin is a stylish action game using the sword.

name: Tic-Toc-Tower: Teslagrad
description: Teslakid, from the game Teslagrad, will be a playable character in this new DLC for Tic-Toc-Tower.

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Age of Nagual
description:
Includes:
- Itz Ocelotl hero unlock
- Aztec High Priest suit
- Royal Macuahuitl
- 300 Golden Crowns

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Street Kid
description:
The streets will tremble!
Includes:
- "Katrina" hero unlock
- "Casual" outfit
- "Aviator" sunglasses
- 700 Crowns

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Holy Beast
description:
Includes:
- Clyde "Dozen" Mullican hero unlock
- Priest suit
- 100 Golden Crowns

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Metal Zombie
description:
Includes:
- Louis "Bokor" Celine hero unlock
- Metal zombie suit
- Voodoo staff
- 700 Crowns

name: Shade
description: Shade is an atmospheric 2D stealth game. You've just been murdered, and as a new ghost you need to find out why. Move between the worlds of the living and the dead, avoiding enemies and hazards. Uncover hidden truths and use your new powers to determine the fates of those around you.

name: Dollar Dash: More Ways to Win
description: Now unlock a completely new game mode "Topscorer" with six maps and a mass of new exciting in-game shop content, such as a new victory dance, costumes and in-game icons! The challenge is set, as each player carries a money bag which can hold $1,000.00 dollars.

name: Survarium: Vepr 'Molot'
description: If you are looking for great value combined with effective equipment and bonuses, look no further. The Vepr 12 Molot Pack provides you with ample opportunity to survive in Survarium.

name: One Piece: Burning Blood - Character Pack
description: This One Piece: Burning Blood - Character Pack contains 6 alternate versions of playable characters featuring new special moves and outfits.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 3 - DLC Pack 2
description: Extend your experience with 4 new missions and 4 exclusive costumes. This pack also includes 5 costumes from One Piece: Pirate Warriors 2 as a free gift!

name: One Piece: Burning Blood - Platinum Luffy
description: Gear up for the fight with a new exclusive costume for Luffy: a stunning platinum gladiator armor! Based on the famous disguise used by Luffy in Dressrosa arc, it also adds some armor elements as well as Fourth Gear transformation!

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 3 - DLC Pack 1
description: Extend your experience with 4 new missions and 4 exclusive costumes. This pack also includes 5 costumes from One Piece: Pirate Warriors 2 as a free gift!

name: Pepo
description: Pepo is a 2D platformer shooting game that fights boss by firing three colors. Join Pepo's adventure of meeting mutant bosses on the extinct planet and leaving to find Pepo's home!

name: Ant Simulator
description: Are you in a daze?

name: Furries & Scalies & Bears OH MY!: Charity Bonus
description: In trying to figure out this new world, you decide to help Lois and Wren deal with some injured animals. 100% of sales go towards Earthjustice.

name: Furries & Scalies & Bears OH MY!: Charity Pack - Echoes of the Fire
description: Every year, the residents of Kale Bay hold a ceremony to remember those they lost in the Great Fire. Sales go towards The Wild Animal Sanctuary.

name: Furries & Scalies & Bears OH MY!: Halloween Harvest Festival
description: Adds an October chapter and three new characters to the base game. Who wants to romance a Werewolf? Raise your hands.

name: Furries & Scalies & Bears OH MY!: The Bear
description: Adds one new character complete with their own story path.

name: Scourge of War: Waterloo - Wavre
description: Following and expanding on the scope of the base game, Scourge of War: Waterloo - Wavre focuses heavily on realistic units, formations, tactics, weapon ranges, and more.

name: Scourge of War: Waterloo - Quatre Bras
description: 1815. Quatre Bras, a small village with no more than 4 houses located in Belgium. But this peaceful place will assume a key in determining the Europe’s fate.

name: Scourge of War: Waterloo - Ligny
description: Following and expanding on the scope of the base game, Scourge of War: Waterloo - Ligny focuses heavily on realistic units, formations, tactics, weapon ranges, and more.

name: Territory
description: Engage in intense interspecies conflict Expand your territory! Begin your journey as a tiny rodent struggling to solidify your place in this world. Avoid predators, grow, mark territory, and breed your way to the top of the food chain!

name: KovaaK 2.0: Tracking Trainer
description: Designed by KovaaK himself, this guided trainer will help you quickly perfect your target tracking. Featuring five core skills, each with five difficulty levels and a rank system to track your progress. Simple and insightful charts help you isolate problem areas. See how highly you can rank!

name: Incremental Epic Breakers: Automation Pack
description: This DLC includes many useful automations. You can enjoy more comfortable play!

name: Chroma Quaternion: Experience x3
description: All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.

name: Chroma Quaternion: Experience & RP x2
description: All characters' experience and RP gained increases by 100%.

name: Railroad X: Trans Europ Express VT 11.5
description: This set consists of a complete VT11.5 train set. Popularly named the TEE (for Trans Europ Express), the VT11.5 presented a milestone in Train design in it's heydays. With it's destinct and representative design the TEE turned heads everywhere. The first trains entered service in 1957.

name: Dungeon No Dungeon: Blood Knight
description: Dungeon No Dungeon is a turn-based cult game with a unique hand-drawn art style, with a strategy system based around body parts that you've likely never encountered before.

name: Dungeon No Dungeon: Reaper
description: Dungeon No Dungeon is a turn-based cult game with a unique hand-drawn art style, with a strategy system based around body parts that you've likely never encountered before.

name: Miden Tower: Experience & SP x2
description: All characters' experience and SP gained increases by 100%.

name: Miden Tower: Experience x3
description: All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.

name: Nectar of the Gods: The Hive and Spidey Party Bugs Bundle
description: Beetles aren't the only thirsty bugs! This Bug Family Bundle adds The Hive and Spidey Party as playable bug families to the (free) Nectar of the Gods base game. After purchase The Hive and Spidey Party will become playable in all game modes.

name: Carcassonne: The Official Board Game - Inns & Cathedrals
description: With the Inns & Cathedrals expansion, Carcassonne's content has been expanded for even more tactical play and competitiveness. With a new meeple and "special" tiles, this expansion will give your game a new twist for even more fun.

name: Carcassonne: The Official Board Game - Winter and Gingerbread Man
description: A cold winter has hit Carcassonne. The citizens waste very little time before preparing hot beverages and sweet pastries. Life around Carcassonne slows down. Occasionally, the people catch a glimpse of a new character, the gingerbread man.

name: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock: Reinforcement Pack
description: The Reinforcement Pack DLC brings new content to Battlestar Galactica Deadlock! With four new ships, new types of ammo and some surprises, the Reinforcement Pack is a must for every Colonial or Cylon admiral!

name: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock: Armistice
description: Armistice is an explosive 8-mission story campaign that brings Season Two of Battlestar Galactica Deadlock to a thrilling conclusion! Unravel Clothos’ plot for dominion, and take part in the legendary Operation Raptor Talon.

name: Seek Girl: Charming Girl
description: This DLC contains 8 new characters, all with animations and sounds. You only need to purchase DLC and install it to unlock new characters in "seek girl"!

name: Eternal Magic: Keeper
description: The Keeper Pack will emphasize your status!

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Space Pack
description: Enjoy cosmic wealth at a down-to-earth price! There's the D.W. 2 Collector tank in an animated camouflage of celestial beauty. Get it all at a favorable price!

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Resource Pack
description: 7 days of Premium Account + 500 gold + 500,000 credits + 50 of each XP type and Rare Credit boosters + CVC Helmet unique avatar. Speed up your research!

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Free Pack
description: Three days of increased profitability! Get 50% more XP and credits, enjoy the improved Garage, and acquire the Undeniable Advantage special camouflage.

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Grand Pack
description: Tier VIII FCM 50 t medium tank + 30 days of Premium Account + 1,000,000 credits + 100 of each XP type and Epic Credit boosters + Graphite Rare camouflage + CVC Helmet unique avatar

name: World of Tanks: Blitz - Mega Pack
description: Break into World of Tanks: Blitz with the tornadic Strv 74A2 and a pile of bonuses! Use its three-shell magazine-fed gun to show who owns the battlefield now!

name: Dream Golf VR: Lighthouse Island
description: With this expansion, you can play an all new 18 hole mini golf course! Lighthouse Island will have you meandering around cliff-sides as you are challenged and delighted with new holes!

name: Dream Golf VR: Jungle Temple
description: With this expansion, you can play an all new 18 hole mini golf course! Jungle Temple will have you exploring a series of mysterious megalithic structures in the middle of the jungle!

name: One Night with Clara
description: A simple NSFW visual novel game. It's full 3D real-time rendering.

name: Tyto Ecology: Himalayas Ecosystem
description: Red pandas, tigers, and bears, oh my! This DLC packs many amazing species in the Himalayas ecosystem for a brand new biodome. $1 from each purchase will be donated to the World Wildlife Fund.

name: Tyto Ecology: Alaskan Tundra Ecosystem
description: The Alaskan tundra comes with 23 new species of producers, consumers, and decomposers for our first arctic biodome. Polar bears, caribou, arctic hares, and more!

name: Tyto Ecology: Cretaceous Mongolia
description: A dinosaur biodome is here, with the Cretaceous Mongolia! Explore an ecosystem from 70 million years ago as you place velociraptor, therizinosaurus, tarbosaurus, and more!

name: Wanba Warriors: Character Pack 2
description: This pack includes 6 new playable characters. They are: M-Fish, Mad Ding, Devil Ding, Ghost, Radish and Foot.

name: Wanba Warriors: Character Pack 3
description: This pack includes 6 new playable characters. They are: Monkie Shifu Bowlie Chivalry Greatos Jr. Eye Boogie

name: Wanba Warriors: Character Pack 1
description: This pack includes 6 new playable characters. They are: Ian Yan Ma Jonn Chow Yiiiii Wheel Basket

name: Rover Mechanic Simulator: Perseverance Rover
description: The Rover Mechanic Simulator: Perseverance Rover DLC lets you fix and learn everything you need to know about the new Mars rover!

name: Market Dominion: Last Penny
description: The year is 1960. Different companies within different industries will reach out for the world's market domination. With fast growing worldwide connection and globalization, a lot of businesses will fight and sacrifice everything, to create a monopoly with them in the center. Can you overcome obstacles to become... the last man standing in the big monopoly you will create?

name: Market Dominion: Global Rivalry
description: The Cold War quietly rages on around the world as tensions rise between states. During these turbulent times, you are tasked as the CEO of a new, enterprising company. Can you overcome obstacles to become a burgeoning company and dominate the market?But can you overcome obstacles when it's Global Rivalry?

name: B.D.K
description: B.D.K is a short experimental first person horror game that mainly relies on atmosphere and sounds to create a creepy experience.

name: Tron Run/r: Cycle Extender Bundle
description: Rev up your game with a turbocharged bundle featuring 9 new Cycle mode levels, 4 new STREAM tracks, 4 new characters, and 3 new cycles.

name: Tron Run/r: Outlands
description: Take your game beyond the Grid with a massive Outlands Pack featuring 16 new levels, 20 STREAM track elements, 5 new characters, and 3 new cycles.

name: BattleRush: German Snipers
description: German Elite Snipers

name: BattleRush: US AT Infantry
description: Anti-tank warfare arose as a result of the need to develop technology and tactics to destroy tanks during World War I. Since the first tanks were developed by the Triple Entente in 1916 but not operated in battle until 1917, the first anti-tank weapons were developed by the German Empire. This antitank DLC include a two new heroes.

name: BattleRush: USSR Army
description: The Workers' and Peasants' Red Army (RKKA), was the army and the air force of the Russian Soviet Federative Socialist Republic, and, after 1922, the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics. The army was established immediately after the 1917 October Revolution (Red October or Bolshevik Revolution).

name: BattleRush: US Marine Corps
description: US Marine Corps

name: BattleRush: Heavy Tanks
description: Tiger was a German heavy tank of World War II deployed from 1942 in Africa and Europe usually in independent heavy tank battalions. The M26 Pershing was a heavy tank/medium tank of the United States Army. The IS Tank was a series of heavy tanks developed as a successor to the KV-series by the Soviet Union during World War II.

name: BattleRush: US Special Forces
description: US Special Forces

name: BattleRush: German Special Forces
description: German Special Forces

name: BattleRush: German AT Infantry
description: Anti-tank warfare arose as a result of the need to develop technology and tactics to destroy tanks during World War I. Since the first tanks were developed by the Triple Entente in 1916 but not operated in battle until 1917, the first anti-tank weapons were developed by the German Empire.

name: BattleRush: Imperial Japanese Army
description: The Imperial Japanese Army (IJA; 大日本帝國陸軍 Dai-Nippon Teikoku Rikugun; "Army of the Greater Japanese Empire") was the official ground-based armed force of the Empire of Japan from 1868 to 1945.

name: Insights: Maniac Vortex
description: An old school point and click adventure game in a nostalgic pixelart look. Young journalist Thomas wants to write a newspaper article about the psychatric asylum in the small town Fuchsberg. Not knowing yet that he will be going on a great adventure leading to the greatest article of his life.

name: Of Guards and Thieves: Hunting Grounds
description: Of Guards and Thieves: Hunting Grounds includes a 2 new classes, Sniper for Guards faction and Hunter for Thieves faction, four new weapons, four new gadgets, one new official map called River Village, 10 new unlockable levels and more than 700 new jungle-themed map editor unique objects.

name: Of Guards and Thieves: Racing
description: Of Guards and Thieves: Racing includes a new Free to Play Racing game mode with three unique vehicles, new classes, skins and 6 new official racing maps. Plus Map Editor support for Racing mode and tons of new map editor tiles that will allow you to build your racing circuits!

name: Dark and Light: Shard of Faith
description: Users will need to own the base game, Dark and Light in Steam library, to run the DLC.

name: Dead Effect 2 VR: Cybermagic
description: CyberMagic DLC unlocks fourth playable character Xandria and adds a lot of new combat abilities for other characters too.

name: Dead Effect 2: Escape From Meridian
description: Escape from Meridian DLC is a story expansion adding a new story arc with 10 story missions filled with new enemies, new features and some surprises.

name: Dead Effect 2 VR: Escape From Meridian
description: Escape from Meridian DLC is a story expansion adding a new story arc with 10 story missions filled with new enemies, new features and some surprises.

name: Worlds Series Battle Grand Master Endgame
description: Unleash on other players in battle royale mode where its every man for themselves. Get to the guns and health first to outwit your opponents in this small world until you remain the victor by most kills. Loot. Kill. Survive.

name: Ants
description: In this family-friendly 2-d puzzle game, you'll place arrows and tunnels to help guide the ants to their new anthills, avoiding obstacles such as rocks, water, ant traps, and spiders. Over 240 levels range from easy to mind-bendingly difficult.

name: Crazy Sapper 3D: Classic Mode
description: This package adds new game mode "Classic", in which Sapper do not need to pass through all minefield, but the goal is to open all mined on the field. Airplane transports Sapper to any available spot on the minefield, and if player will win the level in bonus time - it will increase level scores.

name: Mystic Vale: Vale of Magic
description: Mystic Vale: Vale of Magic introduces 54 new advancement cards and 18 vale cards to the Mystic Vale base game, expanding players' options and opening up new crafting combinations.

name: Aircraft War: Dragon Wars
description: New DLC for Aircraft War. The war continues with all the excitement. Now dragons are involved in the war. You can also play two players from the same computer with the latest update. There is also co-op and versus option in the game.

name: Aircraft War: Tank Wars
description: Distinguished aircraft war followers, now the tanks are involved in the battle, choose your tank and start the war immediately. With this dlc package, 6 player tanks and 5 enemy tanks have been added to the game. Have fun.

name: Aircraft War: Shape Wars
description: Aircraft war now continues its adventure with shape wars. Fight the shapes with this new DLC package. New maps and new characters have been added to the game. Have fun.

name: Aircraft War: Extra Level Pack 1
description: More levels and more fighter jets have been added to the game with this dlc pack. Choose your plane and get ready for battle. You can also play co-op with your friend.

name: Clad in Iron: Philippines 1898 - Manila Bay 1898
description: Additional historical scenario about the naval Battle of Manila Bay for the game Clad in Iron: Philippines 1898.

name: Monster Energy Supercross: The Official Videogame - Monster Energy Cup
description: Don't miss the opportunity to take part in one of the most exciting event of the season with the additional content Monster Energy Supercross - Monster Energy Cup!

name: Monster Energy Supercross: The Official Videogame 3 - Great Legends
description: Buy the Monster Energy Supercross 3 - Great Legends Pack now and relive Supercross history through its best legendary riders and iconic track.

name: Monster Energy Supercross: The Official Videogame 4 - Historical Monster Energy Cup 2011
description: Buy Historical Monster Energy Cup 2011 and relive the historic event in the 450SX and 250SX categories.

name: Monster Energy Supercross: The Official Videogame 4 - 2Stroke Bikes Pack (125)
description: Buy the 2Stroke Bikes Pack (125) and relive the excitement of the 2-stroke 125 bikes.

name: Monster Energy Supercross: The Official Videogame - Compound
description: Expand your gameplay with the new Monster Energy Supercross - Compound. Discover the outdoor compound with two tracks and test your abilities with new and exciting challenges.

name: Vanguard Princess: Hilda Rize
description: Updated version of Vanguard Princess. Play with the boss character Hilda Rize in Arcade Mode and Two Player ModePlay Vanguard Princess in its original uncensored versionExclusive levels and in-game music Hilda Rize DLC Soundtrack MP3s are included

name: Mahjong Solitaire Refresh: Ex Panels
description: "Mahjong Solitaire Refresh Ex Panels" is additional content for "Mahjong Solitaire Refresh". A collection of additional Extreme stages, for those in need of a challenge! Note: Requires the base game "Mahjong Solitiare Refresh" and the in-game conditions for Ex Panels to be cleared to play.

name: Similo: History
description: Play with 32 famous historical figures! Leonardo, Cleopatra, Abraham Lincoln, Genghis Khan, Pocahontas, and many more: begin your expedition across centuries and around the world. Be among those who’ve made history!

name: Similo: Spookies
description: Play with 29 creatures from scary tales! Werewolf, Vampire, Mummy, Witch, Zombie, and many more: all the spookiest creatures from your favorite tales are ready to join your Halloween party!

name: Beyond Horror: Episode One - A Father's Journey
description: The game is the first episode of a survival horror first person adventure, featuring action, stealth, shooting and puzzle solving. Every chapter has a specific theme and will play differently according to the plot, with tons of references to the classics that made the horror genre what it is today.

name: Minions of Elden Online
description: Kill monsters, kill players, grab their loot, and use it to kill them again in Minions of Elden Online, a 2D sandbox MMORPG!

name: Only Hope: Episode 6
description: Decades since we last heard the Gods spoken. The evil soon broke into our world with the full power, causing it to tremble. The world had changed. Colors left us for many centuries, and a new powerful entity dwells. We divided. The matter of blood has never been so important before, as it is now.

name: Only Hope: Episode 3
description: Decades since we last heard the Gods spoken. The evil soon broke into our world with the full power, causing it to tremble. The world had changed. Colors left us for many centuries, and a new powerful entity dwells. We divided. The matter of blood has never been so important before, as it is now.

name: Only Hope: Episode 5
description: Decades since we last heard the Gods spoken. The evil soon broke into our world with the full power, causing it to tremble. The world had changed. Colors left us for many centuries, and a new powerful entity dwells. We divided. The matter of blood has never been so important before, as it is now.

name: Only Hope: Episode 2
description: Decades since we last heard the Gods spoken. The evil soon broke into our world with the full power, causing it to tremble. The world had changed. Colors left us for many centuries, and a new powerful entity dwells. We divided. The matter of blood has never been so important before, as it is now.

name: Only Hope: Episode 7
description: Decades since we last heard the Gods spoken. The evil soon broke into our world with the full power, causing it to tremble. The world had changed. Colors left us for many centuries, and a new powerful entity dwells. We divided. The matter of blood has never been so important before, as it is now.

name: Only Hope: Episode 1
description: Decades since we last heard the Gods spoken. The evil soon broke into our world with the full power, causing it to tremble. The world had changed. Colors left us for many centuries, and a new powerful entity dwells. We divided. The matter of blood has never been so important before, as it is now.

name: Only Hope: Episode 4
description: Decades since we last heard the Gods spoken. The evil soon broke into our world with the full power, causing it to tremble. The world had changed. Colors left us for many centuries, and a new powerful entity dwells. We divided. The matter of blood has never been so important before, as it is now.

name: Arms Race: TCWE - Politics
description: “From Stettin in the Baltic to Trieste in the Adriatic an iron curtain has descended across the Continent.”—Winston Churchill, address at Westminster College, Fulton, Missouri, March 5, 1946

name: NBA Playgrounds: Hot 'N Frosty
description: The new content keeps coming for NBA Playgrounds! With the Hot 'N Frosty expansion pack, you get 8 new unlockable NBA rookies, 3 original playgrounds, 3 fresh tournaments, and 3 brand new balls.

name: Wedding
description: In this 2D horror side-scroller, players navigate the main characters in a classic point and click fashion to explore a house. While hiding from the rampaging monsters, you are to find items to interact with in the otherworldly rooms. Players can enjoy many short plots. There will also be some clues in these short films. The short film is divided by hand to show.

name: Pax Nova: Beyond the Rift
description: Pax Nova: Beyond the Rift DLC introduces planetary effects, new factions, technologies, events, quests, and more, adding hours of new content to enjoy.

name: The Hardest Game in the Universe: Kangel
description: The most difficult challenge on the planet, a new level of difficulty, more terrible, more complicated, with many more obstacles

name: Neglected: Trust test
description: 这次的故事中，玩家会操作白绒绒的帕尔进行冒险，他将会面对全新的实验测试和关卡！

name: Kira and the Life Stone
description: This the journey of Kira a lost soul in the state of limbo trying to get back to life and find out why is he dead. Follow him in his journey of getting back to life and get new powers, fight different enemies and find hidden secrets.

name: Four Kings One War: Virtual Reality
description: A Strategy game designed to suit the modern mind. Control TWO armies as though they were one and get TWO moves per turn. Experience what it is like to be deep in a native New Zealand bush, experience the spectacular scenery and beautiful bird song while you focus on battle.

name: Ultraball
description: Ittttttssss Ultraball! The Ultraverse's favorite game! The fast-paced beat em up sports game that will keep you on the edge of your seat as you punch, knee, and drop kick your rivals to victory. Level up, create different loadouts, and distribute your stats for different playstyles.

name: Psikodelya: The Mansion of Madness
description: Explore a crazy mansion to find eight energy cells. Step into increasingly crazy rooms and learn how space and time work in this crazy mansion. Solve puzzles to open new rooms and go crazy with this new free dimension for Psikodelya.

name: Dream Golf VR: Infinity Towers
description: With this expansion, you can play an all new 18 hole mini golf course! Infinity Towers will bring you to new heights with a variety of devices, dangers, & tricks in a truly awesome environment that will have you coming back for more!

name: Vex: World 4 Unlock
description: Unlocks World 4!

name: Rock 'N Roll: G.E.O.S. Wars
description: Rock 'N Roll G.E.O.S. Wars is a completely new dimension of the original Rock 'N Roll game. In this game, players can work together to vanquish the space rocks that threaten Earth... or they can choose to face each other in a wide variety of duel modes!

name: Cast Piercer
description: Stop time, teleport, control your enemies and escape a sky high facility. Cast Piercer is a 2D stealth platformer set in a dystopian future where the Cast Wars have created a world of chaos which only you can fix.

name: Frontline Heroes VR: 2017 Edition
description: Fight in different scenarios against Humans, Zombies, Bugs, Mummies, Werewolves, Dragons, Aliens, Rats, Drones and more in VR

name: Gotham City Impostors: Pretty Poison
description: The mistress of flora is lovely but just a wee bit toxic.

name: Kronos: Wisdom Trials
description: Can you solve the hardest puzzles in the Wisdom Trials?

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens - The Clone Wars Character Pack
description: The Clone Wars Character Pack brings exciting characters from the acclaimed animated series to LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens. This character pack includes the Jedi Barriss Offee, dark side warriors Asajj Ventress and Savage Opress, and more!

name: VR Super Sports: Table Tennis
description: Hey paddle masters, Forrest Gump's instructor here, bringing you a new DLC for VR Sports. Outwit and outhit your opponent as a ping-pong ninja and earn that ping-pong blackbelt! And don't forget to keep the spin cycle on high ;) Refuse to lose in VR Sports - Table Tennis, and remember, if you want a soft-serve, go to Dairy Queen.

name: VR Super Sports: 10 Edition
description: Finally, the definitive sports experience in VR. You can play your favorite sports with the VR! A brand new yet realistic way of playing sports.

name: VR Super Sports: Golf
description: Grip it and rip it with the new DLC, VR Sports - Golf! Get your daily dose of iron here and wash it down with a nice refreshing Arnold Palmer. With VR Sports - Golf, you feel as if you're on the fairway yet don't have to worry about chasing the golf ball(s) into the woods.

name: Commander: Conquest of the Americas - Colonial Navy
description:
3 new ships: Cog (trade ship) Lugger (trade ship) Naval Snow (war ship)
3 new resources, with new production chains & buildings.

name: Monkey King: Hero Is Back - Mind Palace
